briefTitle: Study of Transitioning From Alendronate to Denosumab
officialTitle: A Randomized Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Transitioning Therapy From Alendronate to Denosumab (AMG 162) in Postmenopausal Women With Low Bone Mineral Density
summary: The study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of transitioning postmenopausal women on current alendronate therapy to denosumab. Endpoints studied will include bone mineral density, bone turnover markers and bone histology in a subset of subjects.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Total Hip Bone Mineral Density
